title: EPISTOLA Phylis Feinstein
html:
EPISTOLA Phylis Feinstein

How did Harry Cimring in “Trite 'n' True” [Vol. III, No. 2] ever miss Light 'n' Lively?

[Phylis Feinstein, Silver Burdett Company, Morristown, New Jersey].
